c2

Parent Cell 1
Parent Cell 2
Parent Cell 3
c1
c2
c3
This test verifies the position and size of the highlight rectangles overlayed on an inspected CSS grid div.

paddedGrid{
  "paths": [
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        60,
        50,
        "L",
        1060,
        50,
        "L",
        1060,
        100,
        "L",
        60,
        100,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 0, 0, 0)",
      "outlineColor": "rgba(128, 0, 0, 0)",
      "name": "content"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        1120,
        0,
        "L",
        1120,
        150,
        "L",
        0,
        150,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 255, 0, 0)",
      "name": "padding"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        1120,
        0,
        "L",
        1120,
        150,
        "L",
        0,
        150,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 0, 255, 0)",
      "name": "border"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        1120,
        0,
        "L",
        1120,
        150,
        "L",
        0,
        150,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)",
      "name": "margin"
    }
  ],
  "showRulers": true,
  "showExtensionLines": true,
  "elementInfo": {
    "tagName": "div",
    "idValue": "paddedGrid",
    "className": ".grid.padded.fixed",
    "nodeWidth": "1120",
    "nodeHeight": "150"
  },
  "displayAsMaterial": false,
  "gridInfo": [
    {
      "rows": {
        "origin": 50,
        "gap": 0,
        "spans": [
          25,
          25
        ]
      },
      "columns": {
        "origin": 60,
        "gap": 0,
        "spans": [
          50,
          200
        ]
      },
      "color": "rgba(128, 128, 128, 0)",
      "isPrimaryGrid": true
    }
  ]
}
nestedGrid{
  "paths": [
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        220,
        "L",
        100,
        220,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 0, 0, 0)",
      "outlineColor": "rgba(128, 0, 0, 0)",
      "name": "content"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        220,
        "L",
        100,
        220,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 255, 0, 0)",
      "name": "padding"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        220,
        "L",
        100,
        220,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 0, 255, 0)",
      "name": "border"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        120,
        "L",
        1100,
        220,
        "L",
        100,
        220,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)",
      "name": "margin"
    }
  ],
  "showRulers": true,
  "showExtensionLines": true,
  "elementInfo": {
    "tagName": "div",
    "idValue": "nestedGrid",
    "className": ".grid",
    "nodeWidth": "1000",
    "nodeHeight": "100"
  },
  "displayAsMaterial": false,
  "gridInfo": [
    {
      "rows": {
        "origin": 120,
        "gap": 0,
        "spans": [
          25,
          25
        ]
      },
      "columns": {
        "origin": 100,
        "gap": 0,
        "spans": [
          50,
          200
        ]
      },
      "color": "rgba(128, 128, 128, 0)",
      "isPrimaryGrid": true
    },
    {
      "rows": {
        "origin": 0,
        "gap": 20,
        "spans": [
          100,
          100
        ]
      },
      "columns": {
        "origin": 0,
        "gap": 50,
        "spans": [
          50,
          1200
        ]
      },
      "color": "rgba(128, 128, 128, 0)",
      "isPrimaryGrid": false
    }
  ]
}
